abstract: Letter from former New York Times reporter Jane Gross responds to February 21 Ann Carrns Your Money Adviser column answering questions about long-term care insurance in light of report showing steep rise in rates.
lead_paragraph: Jane Gross, a former Times reporter, writes about the risks of buying insurance policies for at-home and nursing home care.

headline.main: Long-Term Care Policies: Let the Buyer Beware
headline.print_headline: Long-Term Care Policies: Let the Buyer Beware

snippet: Jane Gross, a former Times reporter, writes about the risks of buying insurance policies for at-home and nursing home care.
